exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L pL : PropositionalLanguage L MD : Model kMD : KripkeModel MD M : Kmodel R : Relation (Kworlds M) SM : Semantics L MD tpSM : TrivialPropositionalSemantics L MD SM stableSM : SemanticStable L MD M SM Unable to unify "TrivialPropositionalSemantics L MD SM" with "(let (semantic_stable, _) := stableSM in semantic_stable) FF".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
minL: MinimumLanguage L
pL: PropositionalLanguage L
MD: Model
kMD: KripkeModel MD
M: Kmodel
R: Relation (Kworlds M)
SM: Semantics L MD
tpSM: TrivialPropositionalSemantics L MD SM
stableSM: SemanticStable L MD M SM

Goal:
semantic_stable FF

Premises:
Record Semantics (L : Language) (MD : Model) : Type := Build_Semantics { denotation : expr -> model -> Prop } For Build_Semantics: Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
Record Language : Type := Build_Language { expr : Type } For Build_Language: Argument scope is [type_scope]
Record MinimumLanguage (L : Language) : Type := Build_MinimumLanguage { impp : expr -> expr -> expr } For Build_MinimumLanguage: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
TrivialPropositionalSemantics : forall L : Language, MinimumLanguage L -> PropositionalLanguage L -> forall MD : Model, Semantics L MD -> Prop
SemanticStable : forall (L : Language) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel), Relation (Kworlds M) -> Semantics L MD -> Type
Record KripkeModel (MD : Model) : Type := Build_KripkeModel { Kmodel : Type; Kworlds : Kmodel -> Type; build_model : forall M : Kmodel, Kworlds M -> model } For Build_KripkeModel: Argument scopes are [_ type_scope function_scope function_scope]
semantic_stable = fun (L : Language) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD) (SemanticStable0 : SemanticStable L MD M SM) => let (semantic_stable, _) := SemanticStable0 in semantic_stable : forall (L : Language) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD), SemanticStable L MD M SM -> expr -> Prop Arguments L, MD, kMD, M, R, SM, SemanticStable are implicit and maximally inserted
Record PropositionalLanguage (L : Language) : Type := Build_PropositionalLanguage { andp : expr -> expr -> expr; orp : expr -> expr -> expr; falsep : expr } For Build_PropositionalLanguage: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope function_scope _]
Relation = fun worlds : Type => worlds -> Ensemble worlds : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Kworlds = fun (MD : Model) (KripkeModel0 : KripkeModel MD) => let (Kmodel, Kworlds, _) as KripkeModel return (Kmodel -> Type) := KripkeModel0 in Kworlds : forall (MD : Model) (KripkeModel : KripkeModel MD), Kmodel -> Type Arguments MD, KripkeModel are implicit and maximally inserted
Kmodel = fun (MD : Model) (KripkeModel0 : KripkeModel MD) => let (Kmodel, Kworlds, _) := KripkeModel0 in Kmodel : forall MD : Model, KripkeModel MD -> Type Arguments MD, KripkeModel are implicit and maximally inserted
Record Model : Type := Build_Model { model : Type } For Build_Model: Argument scope is [type_scope]

Kripke.denote_falsep = fun (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD) (kminSM : Kripke.KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD M SM) (KripkePropositionalSemantics : Kripke.KripkePropositionalSemantics L MD M SM) => let (_, _, denote_falsep) := KripkePropositionalSemantics in denote_falsep : forall (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD) (kminSM : Kripke.KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD M SM), Kripke.K...
Kripke.Build_KripkePropositionalSemantics : forall (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD) (kminSM : Kripke.KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD M SM), (forall x y : expr, Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M (x && y)) (Kripke.Semantics.andp (Kdenotation M x) (Kdenotation M y))) -> (forall x y : expr, Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M (x || y)) (Kripke.Semantics.orp (Kdenotation M x) (Kdenotation M y))) ->...-> Kripke.KripkePropositionalSemantics L MD M SM
truep = fun (L : Language) (MinL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) => FF - -> FF : forall L : Language, MinimumLanguage L -> PropositionalLanguage L -> expr Arguments L, MinL, pL are implicit and maximally inserted
denote_falsep = fun (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (SM : Semantics L MD) (TrivialPropositionalSemantics0 : TrivialPropositionalSemantics L MD SM) => let (_, _, denote_falsep) := TrivialPropositionalSemantics0 in denote_falsep : forall (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (SM : Semantics L MD), TrivialPropositionalSemantics L MD SM -> Same_set model (denotation FF) Semantics.falsep Arguments L, minL, pL, MD, SM, TrivialPropositionalSemantics are implicit and maximally inserted
Kripke.Build_KripkeMinimumSemantics : forall (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD), (forall x y : expr, Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M (x --> y)) (Kripke.Semantics.impp (Kdenotation M x) (Kdenotation M y))) -> Kripke.KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD M SM
Build_KripkeModalSemantics : forall (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (mL : ModalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KM.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD), (forall x : expr, Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M (boxp x)) (Semantics.boxp (Kdenotation M x))) -> KripkeModalSemantics L MD M SM
Flat.Build_FlatModalSemantics : forall (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (mL : ModalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R1 : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (R2 : KM.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD), (forall x : expr, Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M (boxp x)) (Flat.Semantics.boxp (Kdenotation M x))) -> Flat.FlatModalSemantics L MD M SM
FlatSemantics.denote_emp = fun (L : Language) (empL : EmpLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (J : Join (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD) (EmpSemantics : FlatSemantics.EmpSemantics L MD M SM) => EmpSemantics : forall (L : Language) (empL : EmpLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (J : Join (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD), FlatSemantics.EmpSemantics L MD M SM -> Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M emp) WeakSemantics.emp Arguments L, empL, MD, kMD, M, R, J, SM, EmpSemantics are implicit and maximally inserted
Record KripkePropositionalSemantics (L : Language) (minL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD) (kminSM : Kripke.KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD M SM) : Prop := Build_KripkePropositionalSemantics { denote_andp : forall x y : expr, Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M (x && y)) (Kripke.Semantics.andp (Kdenotation M x) (Kdenotation M y)); denote_orp : forall x y : expr, Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M (x || y)) (Kripke.Semantics.orp (Kdenotation M x) (Kdenotation M y)); denote_falsep : Same_set (Kworlds M) (Kdenotation M FF) Kripke...
negp = fun (L : Language) (MinL : MinimumLanguage L) (pL : PropositionalLanguage L) (x : expr) => x - -> FF : forall L : Language, MinimumLanguage L -> PropositionalLanguage L -> expr -> expr Arguments L, MinL, pL are implicit and maximally inserted
Kripke.Build_KripkeIntuitionisticSemantics : forall (L : Language) (MD : Model) (kMD : KripkeModel MD) (M : Kmodel) (R : KI.Relation (Kworlds M)) (SM : Semantics L MD), (forall x : expr, upwards_closed_Kdenote (Kdenotation M x)) -> Kripke.KripkeIntuitionisticSemantics L MD M SM
